title: Please Please Me (song)
summary: "Please Please Me" is a song released by the English rock band the Beatles. It was their second single in the United Kingdom, and their first in the United States. It is also the title track of their first LP, which was recorded to capitalise on the success of the single.[4] It was originally a John Lennon composition (credited to Lennonâ€“McCartney),[5][6][7] although its ultimate form was significantly influenced by producer George Martin.[8]
